nodes.bodyText: we should test timezone_hour too, as the function is not hidden

it's preexisting, but we just learned it's so important
please add a test with minutes offsets here (positive, negative, -00:XX)

please add a test with minutes offsets here (positive, negative, -00:XX)

cast to varchar too:
presto> SELECT CAST(TIME '01:23:45-08:35' AS varchar);
      _col0
-----------------
 01:23:45-08:-35
(1 row)
